Zelda.config.SpriteSheet¶

class Zelda.config.SpriteSheet.SpriteSheet(file_name: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used to grab images out of a sprite sheet.

get_image(x: int, y: int, width: int, height: int, colour: tuple[int]) → pygame.Surface[source]¶

Get the image.

Parameters

  • x – x coordinate

  • width – width of the image

  • colour – tuple of int for RGB colour

  • y – y coordinate

  • height – height of the image

Return image

get the needed image
